definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Preliminary inheritance results show that only one pair of recessive nuclear genes control the Pmw trait.
sentences.chinese: 经初步遗传分析，该乳白花性状由单隐性核基因控制。

sentences.english: We must guard against and redress all forms of covert protectionist activities.
sentences.chinese: 要警惕和纠正形形色色的隐性保护主义行为。

sentences.english: A pair of genes was recessiveness homozygote, it was probably to be ill.
sentences.chinese: 只要有一对基因隐性纯合时，即可患病。

sentences.english: Trichothiodystrophy is a rare hair disorder inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern.
sentences.chinese: 毛发缺硫性失养症为一少见的常染色体隐性毛发疾病。

sentences.english: Forth, lay emphasis on the construction of invisible courses and enhance the cultural taste of medical college.
sentences.chinese: 第四，注重隐性课程建设，提升医学院校的文化品位。

sentences.english: People are paying more and more attention to the existence and dominance of the tacit knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 隐性知识的存在及其显性化日益受到人们的重视。

sentences.english: Malraux's Anti-Memoirs consists of double structures of overtness and covertness.
sentences.chinese: 《反回忆录》由显性和隐性的“双重结构”组成。

sentences.english: There are also other, less obvious, advantages of numeracy.
sentences.chinese: 动物会识数还有其他的隐性的好处。

sentences.english: Implicit persion debts are the cost of reform.
sentences.chinese: 隐性债务是改革过程中的成本。

sentences.english: Its sterility was controlled by a recessive genic gene.
sentences.chinese: 其不育性由一对隐性核基因控制。

sentences.english: Sweet corn is an endosperm mutant which was controled by single recessive gene or multi-recessive genes.
sentences.chinese: 甜玉米受一个或多个隐性基因控制的胚乳突变体。

sentences.english: In normal seedlings the deleterious recessive genes are not expressed.
sentences.chinese: 有害的隐性基因在正常菌木中不表现出来。

sentences.english: Genetic analysis revealed that a single nuclear-encoded recessive gene was responsible for the mutation.
sentences.chinese: 遗传分析表明该突变是单基因控制的隐性突变。

sentences.english: Histologically, the mass lesion was diagnosed as a dorsally sequestered disc herniation.
sentences.chinese: 组织学检查诊断出块状病变为背侧隐性椎间盘突出。

sentences.english: Maple tree saccharorrhea sickness belongs to the euchromosome recessive hereditary disease.
sentences.chinese: 枫糖尿症属于常染色体隐性遗传病。

sentences.english: Morphemes metaphor or metonymy used to form the meaning of a word is called recessive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 语素义通过比喻或转喻来构成词义的叫作隐性关系。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
negative influence, effect that people's doings or behavior have on others (society)
